title: Carnatic Classical: M Balamurali Krishna - 75 Ragam Vaibhavam (1
description:
Carnatic Classical: M Balamurali Krishna - 75 Ragam Vaibhavam (10 CD set) 

M Balamurali Krishna began his singing at the age of six. He continues to enjoy huge popularity across the globe. The internationally known Carnatic singer completed 75 years on July 6, 2005. So &#039;75 Ragam Vaibhavam&#039; was released as a commemoration set of albums of 10 CDs which span the music career of this maestro. 
 <a href="
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Balamurali_krishna" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Balamurali_krishna</a> 

Listing 
Vol 1 
01. Nannu Brova - Raga Abhogi, Taal Adi 
02. Sujana Jeevana - Raga Kamas, Taal Rupakam 
03. Yenu Maadidarenu - Raga Hindolam, Taal Jhampe 
04. Kalinarulaku - Raga Kuntalavarali, Taal Adi 
05. Paramathmudu - Raga Vagadheeshwari, Taal Adi 
06. Ramududhavinchinadu - Raga Jhonpuri, Taal Rupakam 

Vol 2 
01. Raraa Maa Inti Daaka - Raga Asaveri, Taal Adi 
02. Raga Sudha rasa - Raga Aandolika, Taal Adi
